LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_MoonDragon.label: Moon Dragon
LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_MoonDragon.description: Venture to the polar regions, and you might catch a glimpse of this legendary blue dragon. Terrible might is required to overcome this Yokai's strength. Yet, if you are victorious, then its skin can be used to make durable clothing; its tooth-such a simple thing-can be sold for extraordinary value; and its ever-beating heart, the last bastion of a dragon's soul, may be plucked from its chest. Weapons that can surpass the arms of the space age may be made with such hearts.
LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_MoonDragon.tools.0.label: FrontRightLeg
LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_MoonDragon.tools.1.label: FrontLeftLeg
